content.detailedDescription:
I was smoking a pipe in my back yard at about 12:10 am and suddenly, there was a flash in the sky that resembled a star, but the brightness intensified very briefly, then vanished, hardly moving from it's original location. this happened twice and two minutes apart. not sure if it was the same object, but each did the same thing, flash and vanish, moving little (but they did move).
they definitely were not shooting stars because these "stars" were almost stationary, they only appeared and disappeared, they did not shoot. the second one was to the lower right of the first one, about a foot apart in my line of sight.
there were no searchlights or aircraft around, just a starry, calm night, next to the big dipper. i doubt they were satellites because i can usually observe those for awhile and there were two occurrences. neither moved like a satellite and they were much brighter.
my reaction : "what was that?", just like anyone would react.
i had a camcorder available, but these objects were too far away in the dark sky to be seen through a lens. plus, they only lasted about two seconds each (four seconds total).
i would like to know if anyone else has seen objects like these.
content.summary: Flashed off and on, then vanished in night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
At about 8pm on thursday night , march 17, 2016 about 50 to 100 colorful ufo's flashing red and green and yellow flew silently toward the house about 400 feet up. most stopped, took a vertical position and hovered, very closely to each other. some flew
 toward the east. some flew a bit, stopped and hoveted horizontally. they are still here 9 hours later.  my family and i were mystified. i had seen strangely colored lights on the backyard up by the stars for the past 8 months. these seemed to ve the right color but much closer. we were more curious than afraid. with drones and such flying around we just weren't sure what to think. there were way too many and hung very closely together to be drones we later determined.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: These colorful cigar looking very quiet flying objects came towards me. many hovered above me taking a straight up and down attitude like a bat. thete were at least 50. a few flew toward the east and stopped. a few hoveted horizontally but most remained .

content.detailedDescription:
Reddish orange, glowing object fell slowly, but straight down like a rock. just when it was getting close to the tops of trees, it disappears, like it fell from one portal into another. 

strange but a good watch.
content.summary: Glowing object disappears into..

content.detailedDescription: Had just returned from dinner. got out of the car and looked up to the sky for it was a beautiful clear night and the stars were out.  i noticed two objects in the north, moving in a southerly direction.  they caught my eye because i had never seen those kind of lights before.  i look up a lot at the night sky.  we live in the flight path of sfo & san jose int. airports, so i see a lot of airplanes.  at the time i first noticed the objects there was a plane going north, it seemed to be higher than the two objects.  i thought they might be helicopters but the lights were different. they also seemed too high to be helicopters, and they made no noise that i could hear.  they looked like a white circle with kind of blue and green pulsating lights. one went in a south east direction and seemed to gain in altitude until i could not see it any longer.  the other object continued in a south west direction.  it slowed down to a very slow speed.  not a hover but close to it.  then it speeded up to somewhat faster than it was going before.  maybe like 100 mph or so knowing how fast most small planes fly around in the area.  as it speeded up the lights seemed to change to a kind of white fuzzy light with a small reddish light moving around the perimeter of the object. it really made me think i might have seen a ufo.  like i said, i look up a lot and these two objects were not like anything i have ever seen.  i later thought maybe a drone. don't think so.  a drone would not have gone up and out of sight.  they come down.  i asked my wife to come out and look at what i was looking at, just so she would not think i was nuts.  by that time the one had already disappeared but the other was still visible.  she doesn't have quit as good of vision as i do, but she agreed it was different and not a helicopter.  i sure would like to know if any one else saw what i saw.  chances are they would not report it i guess. this is the first report i have made.  it made such an impression on me i took the time to do so.
content.summary: Saw two objects moving south.  have never seen objects with lights like obsurved.

content.detailedDescription: In stockton, california my dad, my son and i were driving when my dad noticed at south east to the right of the moon in broad daylight at 4:00pm - 4:30pm 8 star like orbs in a group were floating. some looked to be in a triangle formation. some were close as like touching. some were flashing or flickering off the sun almost like communicating. they were to the right of the moon in the day when the sun is setting, as like wanting to be seen by all.  we tried to take pics with our cell phone but the orbs were to small to pick up on the camera. we pulled over got out of the truck and some people walking by also saw the 8 orbs in the sky. this was rare to see a small fleat of orbs.
content.summary: 8 white orbs.

content.detailedDescription: Omg my heart is still beating. me and my friend were driving towards the mobile gas station by amy parks elementary and i saw staring at these two, what seemed like stars, floating parallel side by side then i realized the objects were much closer than i thought, so i made my friend look, and she was like what the **** is that **** !?!? the two floating orbs then collided quickly, resulting in a queer boxy craft. we were both in shock, my heart instantly started beating and felt a rush of emotions.  right when i realized they weren't distant stars i was bewildered, i was freaking out honestly, i'm shaking right now because it happened no less than an hour ago. i could draw exactly what i saw it's engraved in my head. and i'll be damned if it's a government project, it defied physics.
content.summary: Two bright star-like orbs floating side by side then joining together to create a boxy craft

content.detailedDescription: Opbserved lots of white lights, then all of a sudden a blue light came close to he window i was looking out of, if exploded and went up and it was gone.No sound i am not really how long.
content.summary: Watched lots of white orbs, then a giant blue light, it flashed and moved.

content.detailedDescription:
1. on march 8, 2015, our family went to the outskirts of murrietta, ca, to launch amateur rockets.

2.  upon reviewing the videos, i first noticed the rockets were being intimately contacted by several objects of at least three morphological characteristics. during this review, i did not notice the moving flashing objects that were near the ground yet.  that would happen months after the first review, when i was carefully examining each frame of the videos. the objects are extremely fast, as we didn't notice them during the launches.

3.  i was excited to see such a daytime event of such starkness. that they would attach to each rocket component; parachute, nosecone, and body, was rather curious and unsettling. months later, i got the second jolt, when realizing i'd missed an additional bright display at and slightly above ground level along a treeline about 100 yards away.  

4. a. the objects in contact with the rockets varied in shape: the rocket body was surrounded by elongated, grey objects, the nosecone had a round, bright disc (or sphere) with a dark spot in the middle. a deep red orb covered the parachute. 

shapes varied for the first reviewed objects. as for the later discovered objects(2nd review): they were spheres. that is, no matter where they were, they were spherical and when metallic blue grey they played light as a sphere does. they were moving east-to-west-to-east in front of a stand of trees and other vegetation.  one orb moved westward and parked on a small bluff for the duration of the event, while the others appeared confused about position. some faded to a grey scale and bluish buff metallic grey or orange.  others, including the object on the bluff, turned bright orange.  

based on the height of a survey flag on a 3-foot stake standing perpendicular about 100 ft away to the south, i could estimate orb size: they were close to two feet in diameter. that is, two of the orbs positioned themselves at the stake(!), increasing in diameter according to the shrinking distance from the camera. additionally, i later noticed 8 dark grey objects in the sky, slightly westward of the launch pads. they appear static (round) as opposed to blurred streaks of grey i'm so accustomed to seeing in the clouds.

5. astonished i was at the sight of bright, mobile orbs and their obvious curiosity, along with some disappointment that i'd missed them both at the site and during the first review. they simply travel too fast. i showed field investigator terry ray the initial sky imagery on my monitor, with objects and rocket components during his visit on sept. 25, 2015.

6. given that the discoveries were made later, we packed up the rockets and left for home, none the wiser. yet.

note: i did not witness anything in the above time frame other than rocket launches. i discovered-after-reviewing the videos at a later time at home.
content.summary: Bright and colorful orbs, and other shapes seen attached to model rocket components at altitude and on the ground.

content.detailedDescription:
Nous ã©tions possiblement en mars 1977. mon jeune frã¨re de 18 ans pratiquait les communications par cb ã  l'ã©poque. il m'avait demandã© de le conduire chez un marchand d'accessoires cb sur la rue pavillon ã  pierrefonds (montrã©al). nous sommes arrivã©s autour de 19h30 et il faisait noir. je l'attendais ã  l'extã©rieur dans l'auto puisquâ€™il avait l'habitude de ne prendre qu'une dizaine de minutes tout au plus. 

plus loin dans le ciel, direction sud-est, je remarquais un point lumineux qui semblait se dã©placer et venir dans ma direction. plus lâ€™appareil sâ€™approchait et plus je distinguais les dã©tails mais sans aucune lumiã¨re. il a passã© au-dessus de ma tãªte, sans le moindre bruit, ã  une distance dâ€™environ 175 pieds de hauteur. il mâ€™a ã©tã© facile dâ€™ã©valuer sa hauteur puisque mon frã¨re mâ€™avait spã©cifiã© que la grande antenne du marchant dâ€™accessoires cb mesurait 125 pieds. je pouvais donc voir que lâ€™appareil volait tout au plus ã  50 pieds au-dessus. ce vaisseau avait la forme dâ€™une tasse de thã© ã  lâ€™envers. il ã©tait dâ€™un gris terne et semblait avoir une multitude dâ€™objets mã©talliques collã©s sur la paroi tout autour, tandis que le dessous ã©tait noir. il devait avoir 75 pieds de diamã¨tre.
 
je ne comprenais pas pourquoi mon frã¨re ne sortait pas. jâ€™aurais voulu partager cette expã©rience avec lui. mais une fois lâ€™appareil disparu, mon frã¨re est sorti et mâ€™a expliquã© que sâ€™il ã©tait restã© plus longtemps, câ€™est parce que les aiguilles de tous les cadrans des appareils de communication ã  lâ€™intã©rieur ã©taient survoltã©es et quâ€™il y avait des sons jamais entendus avant. mon frã¨re essayait donc de comprendre avec le propriã©taire du commerce la raison de ces ã©tranges phã©nomã¨nesâ€¦!

jâ€™inclus une illustration crã©ã©e par un ami pour montrer la forme du vaisseau mais il ne reprã©sente pas tous les objets collã©s ã  la paroi.
content.summary: La forme d'une tasse ã  thã© ã  l'envers avec multitude d'objets mã©talliques collã©s sur la paroi. dessous noir.

content.detailedDescription: 3 to 4 ft. tall grey like creature with pointed ears, large black eyes, small mouth and nose, in blue one piece suit with long fingers, likely less than 5. creature was witnessed in reflection of room while back was turned apparently sneaking from hiding to staircase. appears to have entered and left house by dematerialization or portal of some kind. i was alone in room, seeing mother out to car, father was asleep in another room. creature vanished after that leaving no trace.
content.summary: Grey like entity seen sneaking past in room reflection while back turned.

content.detailedDescription: At about 6:45 i went on to my porch to have my coffee and cigarette like i do every morning. i noticed this bright light sitting above the trees. i thought to myself, is this a star? why does it appear to be moving a little to the left and then to the right. as i was watching it, it looked like these little tiny specks of stars were shooting out from it. i only caught glimpses of them and wasn't sure if my eyes were playing tricks on me. i thought about getting my camera but then again it could just be a star and if it was anything wouldn't our planes be checking it out to see what was in our air space? not a second after i had that thought a huge bright light appeared on the right of the small lite and just hovered there beside it. i honestly couldn't tell you what it was, a plane, helicopter, it was big, very very bright, i did not hear any sound come from it and i hear all planes that fly overhead because i am in direct crossing to the vancouver airport. that large light just sat beside the smaller light then 2 other lights came into view and they all just hovered beside the smaller one. no sound, no strange maneuvers, just all sitting in the sky. two of the bigger bright lights flew away and then there was just the biggest one sitting beside the small light. this went on for about 20 min with the 3 bigger lights all hanging around the small light. then after the 2 bigger lights left, the big one left and the small one just slowly went towards vancouver and eventually disappeared. i don't know if you will get anything out of this video, i have an old iphone and i could barely see anything thru the camera lense as i was filming. i apologize for the poor video. i also have no idea the "degrees" in which the light was, i just threw in "60" sorry!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Small flashing, pulsating light, hovered, moved slowly, hovered again

content.detailedDescription:
Witness saw disc shape that "went flat". it had 4 blue-white lights.  it moved horizontally up and down and side to side in a jerky fashion. it seemed to be moving to her movements, beckoning her to see it. she ran inside to get her husband who saw the object also. it then moved quickly straight up.  they watched the object for a while and then, tired of watching it, went back into their house.

       (submitted for witness by mary margaret zimmer, ssd south florida.)
content.summary: Disk shaped object with blue-white lights

content.detailedDescription: At exactly 5:22 am . i stepped out my front door to smoke a cigarette  i looked out over the tree line towards the north west and observed a bright white light in the form of a ball with what looked like a bright white smaller object above it start to as end at an angle upwards at a slow steady speed .I heard no noise . i couldn't believe what i was seeing . i immediately steeped back inside my door to retrieve my tactical flashlight so i could signal the object . why ? i don't know . but i did. but when i stepped back out after only being i inside for only 5 seconds , the objects where gone . i looked everywhere for the objects in the sky but nothing . inoticedthat the flock oif wild turkeys that live in the fields across from my house began to gobble loudly . after searching the sky for objects, i finnaly observed a light high in the sky flying south from the north .I do not know if that was the object i first observed but ? the sky was dark and clear . no clouds  cool and no winds or breezes . i believe i observed a true ufo . i want to add that object seemed to be asendind from  an area near a creek and a horse ranch with open land around it about a quarter mile away from my house . this object looked like it was two objects connected by a thin light . small bright  ball light with a larger ball light object below , looked like a barbell . very very strange . i was excited about observing this object and knew right away it was a ufo .I wasn't afraid at all . i was dissapointed that i had chosen to take my attention off of this object to retrieve my flashlight for just a few seconds and lost the opportunity to continue watching it asend and what it might have done . but i' mgladthat i did have the opportunity to see it if only for just a brief moment .Ps. this object ascended at a about a 45 degree angle not a straight up and down angle . this was in no way a balloon ,nor a helicopter ,
content.summary: Stepped out front door , looked to the north , observed bright light asend at a slow steady speed.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking home from the local shops with my elderly mother (on the 13 march 2016 5.56 pm)
the sky was perfectly clear, in my peripheral vision i noticed some movement in the sky… i looked up just as a silent black rectangular object passed almost directly over our heads! 
the object was moving at speed (approximately 50mph) on a perfectly straight trajectory exactly as if it was on rails… it’s height was approximately 150 m.
i pointed it out to my mother.. we could not make sense of what we were seeing.. 
barnsbury avenue is very quiet so any sound from this object would have been obvious, but there was absolutely no sound.. 
it was only in sight for 15-20 seconds.. the moment i saw this object i pulled out my iphone to capture some video/stills, but realised by the time i would have the camera ready the object would have passed behind house’s… so we simply observed it with our eyes.
within 30 seconds of this object passing i had set my iphone up to take some digital shots of the location/lighting..
i also made a note of the wind direction *southernly (the object was moving westerly)

structure:
rectangular cube shape (not aerodynamic) ..Beneath the object was 8 thin legs like extrusions that appeared to have some motion possibly being buffeted by the wind they seemed to be flexible like thin rubber.
size:
from what we could make out it appeared to be approximately l=10ft w=7ft h=7ft …roughly size of an old type mini (small british car)
appearance:
it’s colouring was very odd to observe.. the sides appeared to be rough weathered mat black metal, the back end of this object was somehow more than 100% black, the back end seemed to absorb light completely no reflected light at all.. (this light absorbing effect i have never seen in life)

  
i have created to the best of my ability an accurate 3d animated visualisation of the sighting using the digital photo that was taken 30 seconds after the object had gone behind the house.
this is very close to what we had seen in terms structure, size, height, and speed.
i have had many sightings of orb like objects but none have been as close and as clear this black oblong object.. 

my thoughts
• it was moving silently with speed at a constant velocity on a perfectly straight trajectory across the direction of the wind.. so it can’t simply be a balloon or a drone.
• it was not being pulled through the air by another vehicle. 
• my mother and i both witnessed it ..So it's not my imagination. 
• it was black with no illumination ..So not a lantern.
• there was no exhaust.. so i have no idea to what was causing this object to move.
• the light absorbing quality gave me the impression we were observing a new kind of technology not normally seen my man.   
• its size, speed and lack of engine/motor sound also gave the impression that this is of a technology also not normally seen my man.

other witnesses
there could be a good chance there will be other witnesses, it’s flight path takes it virtually over aylesbury town centre.  

kindest regards
richard
uk
content.summary: Silent oblong shape object flys overhead - 2 witness's - in daylight - strange lighting effect

content.detailedDescription:
I am dialy going to walk @ 4:40 to the sit collage i am observing from last one month so 3 to 5 objected moves with glowing star randomly with bright light to dim light and disappears, some it appears in two to three numbers in random opposite direction. particular time and place it is visible it checked 1 kms from the the sighting it not visible same time on a different day, once i saw a light beem and once a falling light object on 03-03-2016.
on solar eclipse day ie: 09-03-2016 nothing seen. last seen ie: 16-03-2016. location 13°19'39.9"n 77°07'35.3"e
content.summary: I am dialy going to walk @ 4:40 to the sit collage i am observing from last one month so 3 to 5 objectes moves with glowing star randomly with bright light to dim light and disappears, some it appears in two to three numbers in random opposite diretion.

content.detailedDescription: Driving back from hospital in parry sound and these lights popped out as they were bigger and in a formation. we could see faint shadows of light behind them. we drove the 30 minutes to get home and the lights are still visible. we lost sight due to tree obstruction on our street.
content.summary: A cluster of lights in a triangle shape with wisps of something light behind

content.detailedDescription:
Three (3) witnesses were standing outside the townhouse and talking when they saw this object very rapidly descended vertically down to the height of tree tops, hovered for a second, and rapidly disappearing back up. approximately after one minute it happened again in same sequence. no pictures or videos were taken because everything happened so fast and no one was expecting it to happen. one witness described the color as "beautiful blue", "insanely beautiful", never seen color like that before. no sound was present, just some "wind like", swoosh.
the object was round blue glowing disc shaped. diameter about 12-15 ft. all its surface was glowing bright blue color, neon like, no windows or other lights were noticed.
everything happened very fast, maybe in 3 seconds from the moment it appeared until disappearance, and then once again in approximately 1 minute.
it happened on march 16th, 2016 in pikesville, md, at approximately 9:50pm, it was dark outside.
content.summary: Bright blue disc shaped object descended vertically down, hovered for a second and ascended back up.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Approx. year 1995. i returned from a trip( truck driver ) at approx 8:30 pm i was standing behind my truck looking west, waiting for my wife to come around the corner to pick me up. something in the air cought my eye. it was hard to judge the distance but it was near to and above a building that was maybe 150 yards away. it had three lights that were kind of oval in shape and in a v formation . at first i couldn't tell if they were all separate or on 1 craft. then i noticed a kind of fog coming out of nozzles near each light. as if to obscure them from sight. indeed if i wasn't looking in that direction i wouldn't have even noticed them. it wasn't until later that i recalled not hearing any sound. i have heard another person that sighted a ufo and recall him saying " i saw the nozzles"  would very much like to talk with this person. i was awed by what i was seeing. if my wife would have got there sooner i would have chased after it. i lost sight of it as it flew behind a restaurant and some trees at the end of the block. had one other sighting on east coast while traveling from nc to pennsylvania, with three other witnesses. maybe another time. i normally would not mind giving my name, but i must consider my family and their aspirations.
content.summary: Dull lights 3. wedge shape nozzles in front of lights to obscure brightness. hard to judge distance appeared to be 4-500 ft up, 80-100 mph

content.detailedDescription:
The following is an article from the fairbanks daily news-miner posted on 3/16/2016

fairbanks, alaska — a fairbanks man who allegedly hit and choked his girlfriend on sunday told fairbanks police he did it to rid her of an alien, according to a criminal complaint. 

daniel lee oines, 57, initially told police he “struck” the woman, then said he didn’t. “he clarified his statement by saying that he believed (her) body had been taken over or inhabited by an alien being, whom he referred to as ‘the butcher,’ and was hitting the (woman’s) body to make the butcher leave,” the complaint states.

oines is charged with felony second-degree assault and misdemeanor interfering with a domestic violence report.

the woman told police she, oines and a male friend were watching tv in the living room when oines began to scream at her and accuse her of being inhabited by a foreign entity. she said oines punched her in the face three times, then forced her onto a love seat and pinned her down. she said oines put his left forearm on her throat and used his other hand to squeeze her neck until she couldn’t breathe or cry out, according to the complaint.

oines stopped the attack after their friend calmed him down by offering him a cigarette, according to the complaint. the woman tried to call 911 but was unable to speak because she couldn’t catch her breath. oines grabbed the cellphone but the woman was able to get it back and run to the bathroom.
content.summary: Man accused of assault claims girlfriend possessed by alien

content.detailedDescription: Went out to walk the dogs about 9pm on 3/14/16. looked to the sse and saw a bright light coming my direction. it was well below the altitude that i see the passenger planes flying. it was not a meteor/shooting star. the light never faded. the object flew directly overhead and i was able to see an outline around the light, but could not make out a shape. there were no wing lights, no landing lights. etc. it was most definitely not a standard airplane. the object flew across the entire sky in just a matter of seconds in total silence....Maybe 10 seconds or so. about the time it got directly overhead i stepped back in the house and called my wife. she didn't hear me so i stepped back outside and watched it the rest of the way. it was so incredible fast, i nearly missed the rest of it. no way was this a passenger plane.
content.summary: Solid bright light. not a meteor, not a plane.

content.detailedDescription:
Looked out window of travelling vehicle and saw this huge flaming circular thing. was told the next morning it was a russian satellite crashing. there were no reports of debris or damaged property. that was impossible! it was enormous.I could not believe what i was seeing
 later i began to try to look up news reports and internet and found nothing. it has bothered me ever since. i had to at least try to find out if anyone else has seen it or of a russian satellite had crashed over nevada.
content.summary: Flames aroun top circumpherance. under cloud bank very low, hovering blue green with flat bottom. circular shape

content.detailedDescription:
Looked out window of travelling vehicle and saw this huge flaming circular thing. was told the next morning it was a russian satellite crashing. there were no reports of debris or damaged property. that was impossible! it was enormous.I could not believe what i was seeing
 later i began to try to look up news reports and internet and found nothing. it has bothered me ever since. i had to at least try to find out if anyone else has seen it or of a russian satellite had crashed over nevada.
content.summary: Flames aroun top circumpherance. under cloud bank very low, hovering blue green with flat bottom. circular shape

content.detailedDescription: I was going through some old pictures i had taken for landscape ideas. this is when i noticed a very shadowy & glowing, strange looking beings. one creature appears as a tall, orange-glowing shadow. the other creature(s) look like lizards or fish heads. i had taken the pic. about a year ago, but just kept it in my landscape album on my phone. i didn't notice the strange looking creatures until yesterday when i was going through my old photos. idk if this is an alien, a spirit, or maybe both.  very strange. i live in s. calif. & my family & i have seen strange lights & orbs floating through the air on many occasions. never have we seen an alien creature until now.
content.summary: Unknown figure(s) on photo

content.detailedDescription: Went into backyard to let dog out, clear night..Immediately saw a very bright light that was stationary. observed for over ten minutes before goin to get my galaxy s3 camera phone.Object would move side to side and up and down but not very far.Smaller orbs would sometimes around it. i just moved to this house a month ago, i've tried taking video, pictures before but nothing would show up, which was strange cuase this is a very bright object..When this picture was taken i could see nothing but black on camera screen..So i just started shooting in objects direction.I did not feel threatened or anxious..The first picture is expanded, second is original picture (look at lower right corner)
content.summary: I see from my backyard at night on most nights

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i observed a strange and unusual storm  from our condo balcony on 31st floor of our apartment in bangkok. it was a very strong swirling storm that was low and passed over our condo. my wife decided to film it as it was unusual. on playback she pointed out the object shooting across the sky under the storm cloud.

the object can be seen travelling from left side of picture at about 21 seconds into the video. she did  not observe the object when she was actually filming.

all i want is some kind of explanation as to what it could be as i am baffled. even if it is something normal, just knowing what the object is would be good.
content.summary: Short and strong storm cloud my wife took video and we saw object on playback.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking north down my driveway to the trash bin around midnight and happened to look up in and saw a huge, pale green, almost translucent triangular shape.  i was able to see it for a few seconds before it disappeared over the trees.  it seemed to be possibly several hundred feet up under the overcast sky and was completely silent.  there were no blinking lights but the object glowed as if lit from within. i estimate that its speed was over a hundred miles an hour and it appeared to be "gliding" in a straight line going northward.  
seeing the object made me stop dead in my tracks and made me feel a little nervous.  i went inside and described what i had seen to my father and then went back outside to look at the sky for a while longer but saw no other activity.  there were no planes or helicopters in the sky when i saw the object or afterwards.
content.summary: I observed  a large pale green translucent triangle going north for a few seconds while in my driveway disappearing over the trees.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back deck smoking a cigarette, when i noticed a unusual purple light in the sky not moving. i thought it was an airplane just coming towards me at first but then i noticed the purple color of it and then it ascended and when it ascended i could see faint blue lights underneath it and then it descended in a rapid zig-zag pattern in under 2 seconds.
content.summary: Sitting in back deck, thought it was plane, noted unusual shape and color, then acended, and descended.

content.detailedDescription: Was driving from greenfield to turners falls, looked up n the sky was flashing, i thought it was heat lighting at first, but lighting dont act like this, the sky was pulsating, but only in one patch of the sky, then it would flicker n shut off like a like switch being flicked, then a minute later it would come back on n start pulsating again, and about 1 minute after it stopped i heard at least 2 fighter jets fly over, i felt excited, i love the unknown,.. the lights just stopped..
content.summary: Lights pulsating

content.detailedDescription: Spotted in the evening/ late dusk, and took about 20 seconds to reach from horizon to horizon. way above another airplane, but lower than a satellite. very fast and in a straight trajectory. no blinking lights, just one steady light.
content.summary: Very fast ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Wednesday 3/15/16, was heading north on mcdaniel road headed to work @ approx. 5:55 am. my co -worker was observing a star( so we thought) and we both were looking at it and talking about stars. then all of a sudden a beam of light came out of the so called star, moving right to left. the light was reflecting off the clouds and very bright. and then it completely disappeared. 
            thursday 3/16/16 @6:10 am , noticed a star about same area then it completely disappeared. had focused on the star because of previous day, this star juts disappeared completely , didn't do like the first one, just disappeared.
content.summary: Headed to work w/co-worker . noticed bright star ( so we thought) seen big spot light then disappeared.
